actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include certain cities and counties in the State of Virginia.

summary.text: Provides, under the Appalachian Regional Development Act, for the inclusion of specified Virginia cities and additional Virginia counties in programs under such Act for assistance in meeting the special problems and promoting the economic development of the Appalachian Region.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include certain cities and counties in the State of Virginia.
